skillTree.name: Barded Ithilmar Steed
skillTree.description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

skillTree.name: Great Eagle
skillTree.description: Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.

skillTree.name: Ithilmar Chariot
skillTree.description: Excellent Elven chariots, barded with priceless Ithilmar for extra protection on the battlefield but at no cost in speed or agility.

skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Knowledge of High Elf Affairs
skillTree.description: This one is well-versed in the various court intrigues of the Asur, which is something of an advantage in matters of diplomacy.

skillTree.name: Knowledge of Man's Affairs
skillTree.description: "The Realms of Man must not fall. Our fate is intertwined with theirs, and if they fall, so too do we."

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +2 with Southern Realms and Norsca

skillTree.name: Knowledge of Lizardmen Affairs
skillTree.description: Of all the 'younger races', the ultra-secretive Lizardmen respect the Asur the most - enough to grant access to certain high-caste individuals.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Logistics
skillTree.description: There are several companies available nearby, my lord.

skillTree.name: Horse Master
skillTree.description: With speed, discipline, and grace, we shall defend Ulthuan.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +2% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Missile strength: +2% for Ellyrian Reavers units
Weapon strength: +4% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Missile strength: +4% for Ellyrian Reavers units
Weapon strength: +8% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
Missile strength: +8% for Ellyrian Reavers units

skillTree.name: Commander
skillTree.description: An Asur Noble is as skilled a strategist as he is a warrior and diplomat.

skillTree.name: Experience of Years
skillTree.description: In countless battles and skirmishes, this Elven Noble has never fled, and has never known defeat.

skillTree.name: Call Upon Favors
skillTree.description: When you are this long-lived and influential, anyone of importance will owe you for something.

skillTree.name: Favored by Isha
skillTree.description: Though she loves all of her children, there are some that seem blessed by her power directly.

skillTree.name: Favored by Khaine
skillTree.description: Though other Asur may find his connection to one of the Cytharai unnerving, true warriors know the value of Khaine's favor.

skillTree.name: Favored by Hoeth
skillTree.description: For every problem, there is a solution. And for every solution, there is a better, more elegant solution waiting to be discovered.

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! Itâ€™s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_replenish_troops}}
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_increase_trade}}
skillTree.description: Trade and investment are the pillars of development.

effects.description: Increase Trade action: Tradable resource production increased by an additional +3%
Increase Trade action: Tradable resource production increased by an additional +6%
Increase Trade action: Tradable resource production increased by an additional +10%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_gain_influence}}
skillTree.description: Wealthy are they who can convince others of their ways without resort to pressure or cajolery.

effects.description: Secure Influence action: Influence is increased by an additional 1
Secure Influence action: Influence is increased by an additional 2
Secure Influence action: Influence is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assassinate}}
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assault_units}}
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Divisive
skillTree.description: "Hmmm interesting. I do wonder if there's a third way, howeverâ€¦"

skillTree.name: Conciliatory
skillTree.description: "Come now, let this conflict cease. We're all Asur, remember?"

skillTree.name: Emollient
skillTree.description: This one smooths the way, so differing opinions do not so easily lead to frayed tempers and drawn blades.

skillTree.name: Profligate
skillTree.description: Extravagant and dissolute, this one could almost be an honorary Druchii, such is their inclination for excess.

skillTree.name: Prudent
skillTree.description: This one acts not for themselves but the for the greater good, in defence of the future.

skillTree.name: Frugal
skillTree.description: The best way to hang on to your gold is never to spend any of it.

skillTree.name: Inattentive
skillTree.description: "I'm sorry, what? I was looking at that cloud - looks just like Aenarion in a certain light."

skillTree.name: Attentive
skillTree.description: The Daemon is very definitely in the detailâ€¦

skillTree.name: Conscientious
skillTree.description: Whatever the task, this one always wishes to do it to the best of their ability - and better on every occasion thereafter.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Diplomatic relations: +5 with Men and High Elves

skillTree.name: Pale & Wan
skillTree.description: It's as much effort as this one can make to lift a blade, let alone swing it at an opponent with force.

skillTree.name: Trained
skillTree.description: Every action is executed seemingly without effort.

skillTree.name: Dangerous
skillTree.description: You really don't want to be on the receiving end of an attack made by this one. You really donâ€™t.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Sundered Armour" that lowers armour

skillTree.name: Squishy
skillTree.description: Some warriors are like rocks - hard and immovable. This one is like jellyâ€¦

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: This one moves like lightning, ducking and twisting to avoid their opponent's blows.

skillTree.name: Resilient
skillTree.description: Armour is just a formality when you're as hard as nails and as tough as old boots.

skillTree.name: Pigeon-Chested
skillTree.description: Bones are not supposed to be on the outside.

skillTree.name: Hale & Hearty
skillTree.description: The very picture of good health. Clearly, there's many years still ahead of them.

skillTree.name: Vigorous
skillTree.description: This one is not at all easy to kill, and many have tried, believe me.

skillTree.name: Amateurish
skillTree.description: If there's a right way to do something, this one doesn't have the wherewithal to know what it is.

effects.description: Melee attack: -3 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee defence: -3 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units

skillTree.name: Practiced
skillTree.description: Practice really does make perfect, or at least makes it much harder to kill.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units

skillTree.name: Honed
skillTree.description: Skills refined and improved upon over time can only increase one's edge over the foe.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee attack: +5 for Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers/striders and Silver Helms units
Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
Melee defence: +5 for Silver Helms units

skillTree.name: Petrified
skillTree.description: This one doesn't have the stomach for intrigue, let alone war and its privations.

skillTree.name: Percussive
skillTree.description: There's nothing quite so impressive - and painful - as a well-timed, well-ordered charge.

skillTree.name: Crushing
skillTree.description: On occasion, throwing the whole nine leagues at the enemy is just the ticket.

skillTree.name: Intolerable
skillTree.description: Some things should not have to be endured.

skillTree.name: Motivator
skillTree.description: Self-starting is a useful ability; starting others - and keeping them that way - more useful still.

skillTree.name: Dynamo
skillTree.description: This one is a driving force; potential is taken and transformed into decisive action by their hand.
